measured_by: Virtual slot-machine card-reveal task (proportion of cards revealed early)
justification: The authors state: “The primary dependent measure was the proportion of time that people revealed each of the cards,” using this behaviour to index curiosity-based information seeking.

measured_by: Percentage of total earnings sacrificed to reveal cards early
justification: They report that “participants sacrificed on average 7.4 ± 2.6 % of their total earnings from the experiment to obtain advance information,” treating money foregone as the metric.
construct: Willingness to pay for non-instrumental information

measured_by: Change in reveal probability across cost levels (0, 5, 10, 15 points)
justification: The article notes that participants were “cost sensitive, choosing to reveal cards less often when the cost for revealing was higher,” and analyses reveal probabilities across predefined cost conditions.
